description: This file sets up an agent with custom API tools to make specific API calls to a dog image and breed list endpoints, and prints instructions for making GET requests to these endpoints.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using tools.

classes.name: CustomApiTools
classes.description: A class providing custom API tools for making API requests.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output a response or instruction message.
